thread.title: ​ 12 Style Lessons Men At the Oscars | Men’s Health
thread.title_full: ​ 12 Style Lessons Men At the Oscars | Men’s Health

title: ​ 12 Style Lessons Men At the Oscars | Men’s Health
text:
Dev Patel’s Tailored Jacket 
A cream, tailored jacket is timeless; so is Dev Patel . 4/12 Getty Images Seth Rogen’s Back to the Future 
The fit of these high-tops with that suit is all wrong, but they are one of the 89 Back to the Future sneakers that were made. We’ll let it slide. 5/12 Getty Images Vince Vaughn’s Too-Small Suit 
Too short on the hips and the hands. If you need a refresher, here’s how your suit should fit. 6/12 Getty Images Riz Ahmed’s Single-Button Jacket 
Riz Ahmed’s sharp blue suit stood out against a sea of stark black, and the single button suits his small frame. Just next time, make sure to iron those pants. 7/12 Getty Images Mahershala Ali’s All Black 
The right way to wear all black and not looking like you’re in mourning? Add a stylish detail, like a bow tie and pocket square . Or just be Mahershala Ali. 8/12 Getty Images Terrence Howard’s Smoking Jacket 
Terrence Howard didn’t let the formal dress code limit his style. He swapped out a standard jacket for a printed smoking one. Where the loafers at? 9/12 Getty Images Justin Timberlake’s Extreme Fade 
JT’s suit was impeccable, of course. But what was up with that hair? Looks like his barber could take a few tips from LeBron’s .
